name: show everything
build LPG onto from RDF onto
show LPG ontology
movie graph
query: MATCH p=(n)-[r WHERE NOT type(r) STARTS WITH "_"]->(m) RETURN p

name: Clint to Kevin
query:
MATCH p = SHORTEST 3 (t:Person {name:"Clint Eastwood"})(()-[:ACTED_IN]->(m)<-[:ACTED_IN]-())*(k:Person {name:"Kevin Bacon"})
RETURN p

name: kb_number property
query:
MATCH (a:Actor)
RETURN a.name AS actor, a.kb_number AS kb_number
ORDER BY kb_number ASC

name: Insert Jesus
query:
MATCH (m1:Movie {title:"A Few Good Men"}), (m2:Movie {title:"Unforgiven"})
MERGE (j:Person {name: "Jesus Barrasa"})
MERGE (j)-[:ACTED_IN]->(m1)
MERGE (j)-[:ACTED_IN]->(m2)
